About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

I was born in the early eighties in New York City and raised with an appreciation for vibrant art, from the musicals of Broadway to hip hop and reggae culture. As a young adult, I became a professional massge therapist passionate to help people make healthier choices and live without pain. After a fulfilling career as a therapist, I am a now a budding computer programmer! I love solving problems, learnig and colloborating with others : )

I am also a commited animal rights activist and passionate vegan!

Web Development & Software Engineer

Proficient in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, Sass, team programming, white boarding and technical communication.

I hold a Web Dev. Certificate from Brain Station and am enrolled in their Jan 2023 software engineering bootcamp.

Entrepreneur and Business Owner

Specialized licensed massage therapist with over 12 years experience in private practice and within spas and chiropractic offices.

Experienced using client-centered, deep tissue, neurofascial modalities and postural exercies to facilitate exceptional client experiences with lasting benefits.

Animal Rights Activist

I am an effective communicator with the ability to follow guidance, self initiate and work collectively with people of all ages and diverse backgrounds.
Over 4 years of experience demonstrating, outreaching and speaking to hundreds of people with over 6 animal rights organizations.
Mentored 5 vegans to increase their animal rights activism as mentor for Animal Rights Mentoship
